title: 'Wife hunt': Norway's crown princess faces backlash over Epstein link; issues apology
summary_full: Norway's Crown Princess Mette-Marit faces backlash over past contact with Jeffrey Epstein, issuing a "profound apology" after emails revealed intimate exchanges and a stay at his home.  Meanwhile, her son, Marius Borg Høiby, is on trial denying rape charges, with the Crown Prince emphasizing his private citizen status.
